lyrics:
18 contributorsvcr lyricsverse 1 romy
you you used to have all the answers
and you you still have them too
and we we live half in the day time
and we we live half at night

chorus romy
watch things on vcrs with me and talk about big love
i think were superstars you say you think we are the best thing

verse 2 oliver  both
wanna find myself by the sea in anothers company by the sea
i wanna go out to the pier im gonna dive and have no fear
cause you you just know you just do

chorus romy  oliver
watch things on vcrs with me and talk about big love
i think were superstars you say you think we are the best thing
but you you just know you just doyou might also like11embed
